text: Meredith Lynn MacRae (May 30, 1944 â€“ July 14, 2000) was an American actress and singer. She played Sally Ann on the show My Three Sons and Billie Jo in Petticoat Junction. She was born in Houston, Texas. She died of brain cancer in Manhattan Beach, California. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Houston Category:1944 births Category:2000 deaths
title: Meredith MacRae
